author: sunkotora
name: SATHIS
description:
My new theme is inspired by Elementary design but dark and android holo too.

Sathis is for Cinnamon 2.0

 

>>Update<<

- Weather applet support
- font size changed
- Changed blue hover color ( blue was too bright)

 

>> Update 2 (23 feb 2014 ) <<

Fixed:

- Notification buttons and font color
- User Applet
- Windows workspace entry selection
- some bugs

 

Thank you for your downloads !

 

Enjoy !
